name: Orbulence
description:
Prototype for a difficult one-room platformer combining tight keyboard controlled movement and mouse aimed dashing.

Controls

WASD - Move
Space - Jump
LMB - Dash

R - Restart from checkpoint
Shift + R - Restart map / timer

Map Elements

Orange orb - Collect all to clear the level

Blue orb - Increases amount of mid-air dashes

Numbers - Minimum amount of dashes needed to clear the checkpoints course

Thanks for playing! Leave a comment if you like the game or have suggestions to improve it
